Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> Morning everyone! Thanks for having a positive discussion for me to see first thing 😃 we really do have an awesome community! Today, I’ll be mostly MIA and working on the new algorithm. Are pools looking good now? In case anyone wonders why there was a pool attack, it was done by someone who was knocking out all the other pools besides the one they were mining on. We don’t know exactly who they are, but we have some identifying information.
